props.name: manager
props.description: The Voice Manager

props.name: guildID
props.description: The guild ID of the config

props.name: options
props.description: The config data

props.name: client
props.description: The Discord Client

props.name: ready
props.description: Whether the manager is ready

props.name: users
props.description: The user's managed by this manager

props.name: configs
props.description: The config's managed by this manager

props.name: options
props.description: The manager options

methods.name: createUser
methods.description: Creates a new user in the database

params.name: guildId
params.description: The guild id of the user

methods.name: createConfig
methods.description: Creates a new config in the database
examples:
manager.createConfig(message.author.id, message.guild.id, {
     trackBots: false, // If the user is a bot it will not be tracked.
     trackAllChannels: true, // All of the channels in the guild will be tracked.
     exemptChannels: () => false, // The user will not be tracked in these channels. (This is a function).
     channelIDs: [], // The channel ids to track. (If trackAllChannels is true, this is ignored)
     exemptPermissions: [], // The user permissions to not track.
     exemptMembers: () => false, // The user will not be tracked. (This is a function).
     trackMute: true, // It will track users if they are muted aswell.
     trackDeaf: true, // It will track users if they are deafen aswell.
     minUserCountToParticipate: 0, // The min amount of users to be in a channel to be tracked.
     maxUserCountToParticipate: 0, // The max amount of users to be in a channel to be tracked.
     minXPToParticipate: 0, // The min amount of xp needed to be tracked.
     minLevelToParticipate: 0, // The min level needed to be tracked.
     maxXPToParticipate: 0, // The max amount of xp needed to be tracked.
     maxLevelToParticipate: 0, // The max level needed to be tracked.
     xpAmountToAdd: () => Math.floor(Math.random() * 10) + 1, // The amount of xp to add to the user (This is a function).
     voiceTimeToAdd: () => 1000, // The amount of time in ms to add to the user (This is a function).
     voiceTimeTrackingEnabled: true, // Whether the voiceTimeTracking module is enabled.
     levelingTrackingEnabled: true, // Whether the levelingTracking module is enabled.
});

params.name: guildId
params.description: The guild id of the config

props.name: manager
props.description: The Voice Manager

props.name: client
props.description: The Discord Client

props.name: userId
props.description: The id of the user

props.name: guildId
props.description: The guild id of the user

props.name: voiceTime
props.description: The user voice time options

props.name: levelingData
props.description: The user leveling options

props.name: options
props.description: The user options

props.name: guild
props.description: The guild of the user

props.name: user
props.description: The user

props.name: channelAndMember
props.description: Returns the user's voice channel and the member itself and creates a new user if a member is present in the voice channel and dosen't exist in the databse

props.name: channel
props.description: The user's voice channel if present

props.name: member
props.description: The guild member data of the user

props.name: data
props.description: The raw user data object for this user

props.name: userStorage
props.description: The storage path for the user's data.

props.name: configStorage
props.description: The storage path for the config's data.

props.name: checkMembersEvery
props.description: The user data update interval (in ms).

props.name: default.trackBots
props.description: Whether bots are able to be tracked.

props.name: default.trackAllChannels
props.description: Whether to track all of the guild's voice channels.

props.name: default.exemptChannels
props.description: Function to filter channels. If true is returned, the channel won't be tracked.

props.name: default.channelIDs
props.description: The channels to track (if trackAllChannels is true this will be ignored).

props.name: default.exemptPermissions
props.description: Members with any of these permissions won't be tracked.

props.name: default.exemptMembers
props.description: Function to filter members. If true is returned, the member won't be tracked.

props.name: default.trackMute
props.description: Whether members who are muted should be tracked.

props.name: default.trackDeaf
props.description: Whether members who are deafened should be tracked.

props.name: default.minUserCountToParticipate
props.description: The min amount of users to be in a channel to be tracked (0 is equal to unlimited).

props.name: default.maxUserCountToParticipate
props.description: The max amount of users to be in a channel to be tracked uptil (0 is equal to unlimited).

props.name: default.minXPToParticipate
props.description: The min amount of xp the user needs to have to be tracked (0 is equal to none).

props.name: default.minLevelToParticipate
props.description: The min amount of level the user needs to have to be tracked (0 is equal to none).

props.name: default.minLevelToParticipate
props.description: The min amount of level the user needs to have to be tracked (0 is equal to none).

props.name: default.maxXPToParticipate
props.description: The max amount of xp the user can be tracked uptil (0 is equal to none).

props.name: default.maxLevelToParticipate
props.description: The max amount of level the user can be tracked uptil (0 is equal to none).

props.name: default.xpAmountToAdd
props.description: Function for xpAmountToAdd. If not provided, the default value is used (Math.floor(Math.random() * 10) + 1).

props.name: default.voiceTimeToAdd
props.description: Function for voiceTimeToAdd. If not provided, the default value is used (1000).

props.name: defaul.voiceTimeTrackingEnabled
props.description: Whether to enable the voice time tracking module.

props.name: default.levelingTrackingEnabled
props.description: Whether to enable the leveling tracking module.
